about_the_game:
Welcome to a new HOME!
This journey is not over yet, we have much more to do!

Features:

— New Quests
After transforming Mars into a habitable zone, immerse yourself in the challenge of increasing the population and expanding the flora coverage on Mars.

— New Technologies available on the Tech Tree
Unlock new technologies, including a new giant Metropolis city to expand your population.

— New Buildings
Atmospheric Humidifier
Advanced Open Farm
Metropolis
Aquatic Water Treatment Plant
Aquatic Water Boost Pump

— New Systems
Desertification
Raising the temperature of Mars too high will eventually cause plants to die off. Investigate how you can prevent this and increase flora coverage in temperate areas at the same time.

Dynamic Water Level
Accept the challenge and be able to transform the veins into freshwater sources.

— Continuing Technologies
If you reach the end of the tech tree, you can choose to research a repeatable technology that makes your operations more efficient, indefinitely.



Also, this new DLC includes:
— New Special Project - Space Elevator Colonist Migration
— Four New Achievements
